name: Kobal 2
summary: Kobal 2 is a two-level PWAD for Doom II, released on June 14, 2009. It was created by Shadowman as a sequel to 2007's Kobal, and features a similar gothic aesthetic on the first map, with many custom graphics and edited sprites to reinforce its setting, whereas the second map is set in a techbase and associated sewer system.
